properties.name: cb.token
properties.description: The secret key to use for updating chatbot data.

properties.name: cb.chatbot-id
properties.description: The id of first chatbot to update

properties.name: cb.vue-chatbot-id
properties.description: The id of second chatbot to update

properties.name: cb.vue-chatbot-source-text
properties.description: The text file name of data source for second chatbot

properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: The secret key use to encrypt and decrypt json web token
